categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: A skirmish occurred on the planet of Sorgan around 9 ABY, after a village hired Din Djarin and Carasynthia Dune to protect them from an unidentified Klatooinian tribe that had been attacking and raiding the village. The Mandalorian and Dune taught the villagers some basic fighting and shooting techniques, then arranged for them to build defenses around the village so the Klatooinian tribe's AT-ST Raider and tribe were forced to approach from a single entrance. The village then dug holes in front of the entrance so the AT-ST Raider would fall into it after stepping forward. The plan worked and ended with the AT-ST Raider destroyed and the Klatooinian tribe repelled.
